level.text: If the trade name registration is related to a person registered with a master business license the trade name registration shall have the same expiration date as the master business license.

If the trade name registration is related to a person who is exempt from the master business license registration requirement, the trade name registration shall expire two years from the date of registration.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 10075 (November 8, 2002).
